first_para: Andrew John Turner (born 24 October 1953, in Coventry) is a Conservative Party politician in the United Kingdom. He is currently the Member of Parliament (MP) for the Isle of Wight, a post he has held since the 2001 general election.

full.extract:
Andrew John Turner (born 24 October 1953, in Coventry) is a Conservative Party politician in the United Kingdom. He is currently the Member of Parliament (MP) for the Isle of Wight, a post he has held since the 2001 general election.
^ "Members of Parliament – Andrew Turner MP, Isle of Wight". Conservative Party. Retrieved 25 May 2009. 
^ "Andrew Turner MP for the Isle of Wight". TheyWorkForYou. Archived from the original on 8 June 2009. Retrieved 25 May 2009.
full.title: Andrew Turner (politician)
